Package com.example.chat_room.controller

Class ChatController

java.lang.Object
com.example.chat_room.controller.ChatController
@Controller public class ChatController extends Object
Controller for handling chat-related operations.

    • showChatroom

      @GetMapping("/chatroom") public String showChatroom(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails currentUser, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the chatroom page with a list of private and group chats.
      Parameters:
      currentUser - the currently authenticated user
      model - the model to hold attributes for the view
      Returns:
      the chatroom view

    • showChat

      @GetMapping("/chat/{id}") public String showChat(@PathVariable Long id, @AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails userDetails, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Displays the chat page for a specific chat.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the chat
      userDetails - the details of the currently authenticated user
      model - the model to hold attributes for the view
      session - the HTTP session
      Returns:
      the chat view

    • sendMessage

      @PostMapping("/chat/{id}/send") public String sendMessage(@PathVariable Long id, @AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails userDetails, @RequestParam String messageContent, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Handles the sending of a message in a specific chat.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the chat
      userDetails - the details of the currently authenticated user
      messageContent - the content of the message to be sent
      model - the model to hold attributes for the view
      session - the HTTP session
      Returns:
      a redirect to the chat view

    • likeMessage

      @PostMapping("/chat/{chatId}/message/{messageId}/like") public String likeMessage(@PathVariable Long chatId, @PathVariable Long messageId, @AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails userDetails)

      Parameters:
      chatId - the ID of the chat
      messageId - the ID of the message to be liked
      userDetails - the details of the currently authenticated user
      Returns:

      Handles the creation of a new group chat.
      Parameters:
      groupName - the name of the group chat
      userIds - the IDs of the users to be added to the group chat
      currentUser - the currently authenticated user
      model - the model to hold attributes for the view
      Returns:
      the create group chat view

    • calculateUnreadMessagesCount

      private Map<Long,Long> calculateUnreadMessagesCount(User user, List<Chat> userChats)
      Calculates the unread messages count for each chat.
      Parameters:
      user - the currently authenticated user
      userChats - the list of chats the user is part of
      Returns:
      a map of chat IDs to unread messages count

    • formatAndMarkMessagesAsRead

      private void formatAndMarkMessagesAsRead(User currentUser, List<Message> messages, List<Long> editableMessageIds)
      Formats messages and marks them as read for the current user.
      Parameters:
      currentUser - the currently authenticated user
      messages - the list of messages to format and mark as read
      editableMessageIds - the list of message IDs that are editable
